name: Marsville
description:
Gamedev.js Jam 2022 entry

Note: game is playable only on GitHub at the moment since NEAR wallet calls can't be embedded via iframe on the itch.io website for security reasons. Use 'Download' button to open game in a new tab or go to https://vilpy.github.io/marsville-game/

Marsville is a idle game where you need to collect raw resources on the Mars while expanding your base.

You can ascend into next base after collecting 1mil resources.

Project is using NEAR protocol blockchain to save the game state. Since every build action is a single transaction in the blockchain and every transaction costs some crypto, game is only using Testnet which provides free test accounts. You would need to create your wallet on https://wallet.testnet.near.org/ in order to play.
